existing_features.title: Enforce Dearness Allowance (DA) as a fixed amount of Rs 8419 across the Salary Split Calculator for all zones and both calculation modes (Manual Entry and Tamil Nadu Hotel Rule), so DA cannot be changed by users and all computations always use DA = 8419.
Update the Tamil Nadu Hotel Rule configuration UI and validation to match fixed DA behavior, so users are not asked to configure DA as a percentage when DA is a fixed amount of 8419.

new_feature_requests.summary: Set DA (Dearness Allowance) as a fixed amount of Rs 8419 for all users/employees

projectName: Make Dearness Allowance (DA) a fixed amount of Rs 8419 for all calculations
